incorporation_agency: DC Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs - Corporations Division
charitable_registration_agency: DC Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs - Corporations Division
exemption_threshold_note: Organizations with gross revenue under $25,000 annually may be exempt. Religious organizations exempt.

formation_requirements.filing_agency: DC Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs
formation_requirements.notes: DC allows single-director nonprofits. Higher incorporation fee.

requirements.filing_agency: DC Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs
requirements.notes: Biennial report fee $80. Due April 1st every two years.

requirements.filing_agency: DC Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs

DC Office of Tax and Revenue
DC Office of Tax and Revenue

requirements.notes: Raffles permitted for qualified nonprofits. $50 license fee.

requirements.filing_agency: DC Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs

requirements.notes: Audit required for organizations with revenue over $500,000.

special_notes.biennial_reporting: DC requires biennial (every 2 years) corporate reports, not annual.
special_notes.high_fees: DC has some of the highest nonprofit fees nationwide, including $220 incorporation fee and $500 professional fundraiser fee.
special_notes.federal_district: As a federal district, DC has unique regulatory environment combining state-like and federal oversight.
special_notes.audit_mandated: DC mandates audits for organizations over $500,000 in revenue.
